entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to zero by morning. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming south 20 km/h this evening. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 8 this evening. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. A few flurries or rain showers beginning near noon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clearing. Low minus 19.
entry.summary: Clearing early in the evening. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the evening. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 9 in the evening and minus 27 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Sunday 19 February 2023
